Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/71st
ShortDescription: NB 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 71st, Wentworth, and 69th due to, street blockage near State/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 71st, Wentworth, and 69th due to, street blockage near State/71st.

Soiuthbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Westbound Reroute near State/71st

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
